# AI Prompts Library (AI 提示词库)

> Your ultimate resource for AI-generated content prompts - 10,000+ curated prompts for image, video, and audio generation.

## Overview

AI Prompts Library (topai.ink) is a comprehensive platform that curates high-quality AI prompts for creative professionals, designers, and AI enthusiasts. We help users master and effectively use cutting-edge AI models like Midjourney, Stable Diffusion, Runway, Sora, and more.

## What We Offer

### Prompt Categories
- **Text-to-Image**: Prompts for AI image generation (Midjourney, Stable Diffusion, DALL-E)
- **Text-to-Video**: Prompts for AI video creation (Runway Gen-2, Pika Labs, Sora)
- **Text-to-Audio**: Prompts for AI music and audio generation (Suno AI)
- **Image Restoration**: Prompts for AI-powered image enhancement and repair

### Supported AI Models
- Midjourney V6 (realistic photography, artistic creation)
- Niji Journey (anime illustrations)
- Stable Diffusion XL (SDXL)
- DALL-E 3
- Runway Gen-2
- Pika Labs
- Sora
- Suno AI
- And many more...

### Art Styles Covered
- Anime/2D illustration
- Realistic photography
- 3D rendering
- Logo design
- UI/UX design
- Abstract art
- Portrait photography
- Landscape photography
- Product visualization

## How to Use

1. Browse our curated prompt collection
2. Search by keywords or filter by tags
3. View complete prompt parameters (including negative prompts, aspect ratios, stylization settings)
4. One-click copy prompts to use in your AI tools
5. Customize and iterate on prompts for your creative needs

## Key Features

- 10,000+ verified high-quality prompts
- Daily updates with new prompts
- Bilingual support (Chinese/English)
- Complete prompt parameters included
- Source attribution for all prompts
- Mobile-friendly responsive design
- Advanced search and filtering

## Languages

- Chinese (中文): https://www.topai.ink/zh
- English: https://www.topai.ink/en

## Contact

Website: https://www.topai.ink

---

*This file is designed for Large Language Models to better understand our website content. For human visitors, please visit our website directly.*
